long description: Local Idea to Idea calls at 10ps/min

Unlimited Local & STD calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- Get 5% of MRP as TT on recharges through My Idea App and Idea Website -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity
25000 Local/STD Mobile secs. Upto 35000 Local/STD Mobile secs subject to time of recharge by the customer

Unlimited Local/STD Calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- Get 5% of MRP as TT on recharges through My Idea App and Idea Website -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.

Unlimited Local/STD Calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- Get 5% of MRP as TT on recharges through My Idea App and Idea Website -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.

***Unlimited Local Mobile calls -- ***This STV should not be used for any commercial activity. Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for making 100 unique calls in a week OR 1500 minutes in a week. Customers found violating the said norm shall be shifted to limited pack of 6000 minutes for the rest of the validity.
